entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
